GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15.64 to before v5.15.86
GSD.description:
fbdev: fbcon: release buffer when fbcon_do_set_font() failed

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.86 by commit 88ec6d11052da527eb9268831e7a9bc5bbad02f6, it was introduced in version v5.15.64 by commit ebd6f886aa2447fcfcdce5450c9e1028e1d681bb. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: fbdev: fbcon: release buffer when fbcon_do_set_font() failed
